EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.8-11-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Help Developers Do What They Love, Containers and Culture, and Cloud Native Partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
August 11, 2016 <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> How PCF, Spring, and Pivotal Labs Help Developers Do What They Love Onsi Fakhouri's keynote at SpringOne Platform is one for the ages. Laugh, be entertained, and learn something. Watch The Video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/episode-028]]> Partnering in the Cloud Native Ecosystem, feat. Josh McKenty with Richard Seroter and Cote In the latest episode of Pivotal Conversations, Richard Seroter and Cote sit down with Josh McKenty to discuss the implementation of different partner apps, services and consulting with Pivotal Cloud Foundry. Listen Now <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/episode-028]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3kMbEkm8p2w]]> Containers Will Not Fix Your Broken Culture Bridget Kromhout lays down some real talk on how things like containers are good tools, but they will not fix communication or team problems. Watch The Video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3kMbEkm8p2w]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VzICcv_0oAA]]> Results Should Be More Fun Andy Zitney, SVP of Infrastructure Services at McKesson, talks about how we can go about saving the yak-shaving enterprises. He discusses legacy environments, getting management on board, and how development can be more creative, empowering, and energetic. Watch The Video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VzICcv_0oAA]]> Upcoming Events 8/17 Extending the Platform: Cloud Foundry and Spring Boot, Toronto <[[http://www.meetup.com/Toronto-Pivotal-User-Group/events/227459961/]]>
8/17 Insights to Action: How to Transform Your Business with Smart Applications, Online <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/how-to-transform-your-business-with-smart-applications]]>
8/18 Why Cloud Native? (Lunch Series), London <[[https://pivotal.io/event/powerlunch]]>
8/23 Algebraic Data Types in Kotlin: A Pragmatist's Guide, Chicago <[[http://www.meetup.com/Chicago-Kotlin-Users-Group/events/233247796/]]>
8/26 Breaking the Monolith, Online <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/breaking-the-monolith]]>
Check out Upcoming Pivotal Education Courses <[[http://pivotal.io/events#training]]>
